title: Farm Input Inventory Check
description: A farmer is preparing for planting and needs to know if they have enough seed and fertilizer on hand.

tasks.description: Calculate the total amount of corn seed required based on the planned acreage and the target seeding rate.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the total seed requirement.

tasks.description: Check the current on-farm inventory level for the specified corn seed variety.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the current inventory count from the management system.

tasks.description: Compare the required amount with the inventory and notify the farmer of the shortfall, if any.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent informs the farmer they are 50 bags short of the required seed and need to order more.
